contentList.content: Gain three shots of ammunition per <LSTag Tooltip="ShortRest">Short Rest</LSTag>, used to fire your currently equipped firearms unique actions. You may also restore your supply of Ammunition by <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_Reload_Firearm">Reloading</LSTag>.
Masters of invention, artificers use ingenuity and magic to unlock extraordinary capabilities in objects. They see magic as a complex system waiting to be decoded and then harnessed.

Gain three firearms, each with unique uses. As you level within Artificer, they will deal additional damage and gain new effects.

Swapping your firearms may be done at any time, and will not consume a Reaction.

Your firearms have drastically improved craftsmanship. They deal additional damage and have new effects.

Swapping your firearms may be done at any time, and will not consume a Reaction.

Your firearms have reached the peak of their craftsmanship. They deal additional damage and have new effects.

Swapping your firearms may be done at any time, and will not consume a Reaction.
While firing at multiple enemies within [1] of each other, this weapon rolls all damage dealt with <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag>.
Upon landing a Killing Blow with this weapon, your target explodes, dealing [1] to all enemies within [2] of them.
Dealing damage with this weapon twice to the same enemy within a turn will always roll the second hit as a <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hit</LSTag>.
Affected creature will be <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critically Hit</LSTag> if damaged by a blunderbuss.
When dealing damage with this weapon to an enemy who has yet to take a turn, you deal the maximum damage possible.
While your target is looking away from you, this weapon deals additional damage equal to your <LSTag Tooltip="ProficiencyBonus">Proficiency Bonus</LSTag>.
When firing this weapon, you make your <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> with <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag>.
Upon firing this weapon, you deal additional damage equal to your <LSTag Tooltip="ProficiencyBonus">Proficiency Bonus</LSTag> if you have not moved during your turn.
Dealing damage with this weapon to an enemy below 33% of their total <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">Hit Points</LSTag> will deal the maximum damage possible.
Dealing damage with this weapon to an enemy below 33% of their total <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">Hit Points</LSTag> will always roll a <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hit</LSTag>.
Experts at combining the arcane with machinery to produce mystical effects, the oldest of Artificer traditions. An Arcanist's versatility has long been valued during times of both war and peace.
The Right Tools for the Job

You may select two of any Spell per level. However, Spells you select must be equipped from your Spellbook. The number of Spells that can be equipped at any given time is equal to your level added to your <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityModifier">Intelligence Modifier</LSTag>.

Once per turn, upon landing a Killing Blow with a <LSTag Tooltip="RangedWeaponAttack">Ranged Weapon Attack</LSTag>, you restore a <LSTag Tooltip="SpellSlot">Spell Slot</LSTag>. The level of the Spell Slot restored is equal to half of your levels in Artificer, rounded up.

Casting a Spell allows you to make a <LSTag Tooltip="RangedWeaponAttack">Ranged Weapon Attack</LSTag> as a <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="BonusActionPoint">Bonus Action</LSTag> for the rest of your turn.

Once per turn, upon dealing damage with a <LSTag Tooltip="RangedWeaponAttack">Ranged Weapon Attack</LSTag>, you create an <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_ConjureTurret_ArcaneMissile">Arcane Missile</LSTag> which seeks out one other target.

Upon <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_Reload_Firearm">Reloading</LSTag> your firearms, Spells you cast make both their <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> and Damage Rolls with <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag>.
Affected creature's Spells make both their <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> and Damage Rolls with <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag>.

Once per turn, landing a <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hit</LSTag> with a <LSTag Tooltip="RangedWeaponAttack">Ranged Weapon Attack</LSTag> will allow you to cast a Spell without expending a <LSTag Tooltip="SpellSlot">Spell Slot</LSTag>.
Affected creature may cast a Spell without expending a <LSTag Tooltip="SpellSlot">Spell Slot</LSTag>.
Artillerists specialize in hurling projectiles down range and creating various types of explosions on the battlefield. This destructive power is valued by armies across many different worlds.
When dealing damage with a <LSTag Tooltip="RangedWeaponAttack">Ranged Weapon Attack</LSTag>, you ignore piercing <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag>.
Upon landing a killing blow, you may fire <LSTag Tooltip="RangedWeaponAttack">Ranged Weapon Attacks</LSTag> as a <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="BonusActionPoint">Bonus Action</LSTag>.
Affected creature may fire <LSTag Tooltip="RangedWeaponAttack">Ranged Weapon Attacks</LSTag> as a <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="BonusActionPoint">Bonus Action</LSTag>.

Dealing damage to an enemy with a <LSTag Tooltip="RangedWeaponAttack">Ranged Weapon Attack</LSTag> will <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MARKED_SUPPRESSION">Mark</LSTag> them. When either yourself or allies make an <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> against a Marked creature, it is rolled with <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag>. Only one enemy may be Marked at a time.
Affected creature is Marked. <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> made against them are rolled with <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag>. Only one enemy may be Marked at a time.

Dealing damage to an enemy with a Ranged Weapon Attack which only target one creature will apply one stack of Focus Fire. Each time that they are subsequently damaged by a Ranged Weapon Attack, they take additional damage equal to the amount of Focus Fire stacks they have remaining.

Damaging another creature or missing your shot will reset the amount of stacks.
Affected creature will take additional damage equal to the amount of stacks of <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="FOCUSFIRE">Focus Fire</LSTag> they have remaining.
Affected creature will deal additional damage equal to the amount of stacks of <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="FOCUSFIRE">Focus Fire</LSTag> their target has remaining.
Once per turn, landing a Killing Blow with a <LSTag Tooltip="RangedWeaponAttack">Ranged Weapon Attack</LSTag> will restore an <LSTag Tooltip="Action">Action</LSTag>.
Your <LSTag Tooltip="RangedWeaponAttack">Ranged Weapon Attacks</LSTag> which only target one creature may now target two creatures instead.

Armies require protection, and someone has to put things back together if defenses fall. A Battle Synthetic is an expert at defending others and repairs on the field. To aid in their work, Battlesmiths are accompanied by an Automaton.
Your <LSTag Tooltip="RangedWeaponAttack">Ranged Weapon Attack</LSTag> heal allies within [1] of your target for [2] <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">Hit Points</LSTag>.
Summon your own personal Automaton. Lil' G grows in strength alongside you as you level as a Battle Synthetic.

Upon damaging an enemy with a <LSTag Tooltip="RangedWeaponAttack">Ranged Weapon Attack</LSTag>, they become <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SYNTHETIC_MARK">Synthetically Marked</LSTag> until the end of their next turn. Allies who damage a Synthetically Marked creature will recover [1] <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">Hit Points</LSTag>. Only one enemy may be Synthetically Marked at a time.
Affected creature will heal whomever damages them for [1] <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">Hit Points</LSTag>.
Your firearms are capable of healing allies when targeting them.
Allies standing within [1] of Lil' G regain <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">Hit Points</LSTag> every turn.

<LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_Reload_Firearm">Reloading</LSTag> your firearm causes allies within [1] of you to gain the maximum amount of <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">Hit Points</LSTag> possible when healed until the end of your current turn.
Affected creature will gain the maximum amount of <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">Hit Points</LSTag> possible when healed.
Lil' G has grown to an enormous size, growing stronger than ever!
Fire an beam of Arcane energy at a nearby target. This beam seeks your target out, and cannot miss.
Fire an beam of Arcane energy at a nearby ally in order to cleanse them of all cases of blindness, disease, intoxication, paralysis or poison.
Self destruct, causing massive damage to anything nearby when the blast erupts.
Pull all nearby creatures toward you.
Lil' G feels terrible about what he has to do, but do it he will!

To an Infused Arcsmith, bodies are but a malleable canvas. Enhanced and honed through magic in order to unleash their potency, an Arcsmith's power only grows over time as experimentation and bonding further refines their work.
Used in order to infuse allies and enemies.

Gain the ability to infuse allies and enemies in order to apply powerful buffs and debuffs. In addition, <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_Reload_Firearm">Reloading</LSTag> your firearms will restore one <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="InfusionSlots">Matrix Charge</LSTag>.

Infuse enemies or allies in order to provide a variety of different effects. Enemies currently under <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="LOCKDOWN_CONDITION_DESCRIPTION">Lockdown Immunity</LSTag> cannot be <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="INFUSION">Infused</LSTag>.

You may expend one <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="InfusionSlots">Matrix Charge</LSTag> in order to grant an ally <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Ability Checks</LSTag>. Additionally, when an ally or enemy is about to be damaged, you may expend your <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="ReactionActionPoint">Reaction</LSTag> and a <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="InfusionSlots">Matrix Charge</LSTag> to immediately <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="INFUSION">Infuse</LSTag> them.
Grant an ally <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Ability Checks</LSTag>.
Affected creature has <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityCheck">Ability Checks</LSTag>.
When an ally is about to be damaged, immediately <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="INFUSION">Infuse</LSTag> them.
When an ally is about to damage an enemy, immediately <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="INFUSION">Infuse</LSTag> the enemy they are targeting.
You may now <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="INFUSION">Infuse</LSTag> two creatures at once.
Once per turn, upon landing a Killing Blow or a <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hit</LSTag>, you restore one <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="InfusionSlots">Matrix Charge</LSTag>.
You may now <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="INFUSION">Infuse</LSTag> three creatures at once.

Upon <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="INFUSION">Infusing</LSTag> an ally they will experience a sudden surge of positive <LSTag Tooltip="WildMagic">Wild Magic</LSTag>. Upon Infusing an enemy, they will instead experience a negative surge of Wild Magic. This may occur once per turn.
Select an effect to apply to your allies upon Infusing them.
Affected creature is affected by a variety of effects based on an Arcsmith's passives.
Grant allies <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> to all damage upon <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="INFUSION">Infusing</LSTag> them.
Grant allies a +2 bonus to their <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">Armour Class</LSTag> upon <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="INFUSION">Infusing</LSTag> them.
<LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="CALMED">Calm</LSTag> allies upon <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="INFUSION">Infusing</LSTag> them.
Allies you <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="INFUSION">Infuse</LSTag> cannot lose their <LSTag Tooltip="Concentration">Concentration</LSTag>.
The number your <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="INFUSION">Infused</LSTag> allies need to roll a <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hit</LSTag> is reduced by one.
Grant allies <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on all Damage Rolls upon <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="INFUSION">Infusing</LSTag> them.
Grant allies a +2 bonus to all <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag> upon <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="INFUSION">Infusing</LSTag> them.
Grant allies <LSTag Tooltip="TemporaryHitPoints">Temporary Hit Points</LSTag> equal to their level multiplied by four upon <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="INFUSION">Infusing</LSTag> them.
Allies you <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="INFUSION">Infuse</LSTag> immediately <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="DASH">Dash</LSTag> and <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="DISENGAGE">Disengage</LSTag>.
Allies you <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="INFUSION">Infuse</LSTag> restore the maximum amount of <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">Hit Points</LSTag> possible when healed.
Allies you <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="INFUSION">Infuse</LSTag> push enemies backward by [1] when dealing damage.
Allies you <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="INFUSION">Infuse</LSTag> have their weapons damage dice increased to a D20.
Allies you <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="INFUSION">Infuse</LSTag> will always roll at least a 4 when dealing damage.
Grant allies +2 bonus to their <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> upon <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="INFUSION">Infusing</LSTag> them.
Grant allies <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on all <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> upon <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="INFUSION">Infusing</LSTag> them.
Grant allies an additional <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="ReactionActionPoint">Reaction</LSTag> upon <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="INFUSION">Infusing</LSTag> them.
Allies you <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="INFUSION">Infuse</LSTag> ignore all forms of damage <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag>.
Grant allies a +2 bonus to their <LSTag Tooltip="DifficultyClass">Difficulty Class</LSTag> upon <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="INFUSION">Infusing</LSTag> them.
Allies you <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="INFUSION">Infuse</LSTag> may cast one Spell without expending a <LSTag Tooltip="SpellSlot">Spell Slot</LSTag>.
Grant allies <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on all <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag> upon <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="INFUSION">Infusing</LSTag> them.
Select an effect to apply to your enemies upon Infusing them.
Impose upon enemies a -2 penalty to their <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">Armour Class</LSTag> upon <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="INFUSION">Infusing</LSTag> them.
Upon <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="INFUSION">Infusing</LSTag> an enemy, they immediately lose their <LSTag Tooltip="Concentration">Concentration</LSTag>.
Enemies you <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="INFUSION">Infuse</LSTag> cannot roll <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hits</LSTag>.
Upon <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="INFUSION">Infusing</LSTag> an enemy, they become rife with <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MADNESS">Madness</LSTag>.
Impose upon enemies -2 penalty to <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag> upon <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="INFUSION">Infusing</LSTag> them.
Enemies you <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="INFUSION">Infuse</LSTag> take 1d8 Force damage multiplied by your <LSTag Tooltip="ProficiencyBonus">Proficiency Bonus</LSTag>.

Enemies you <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="INFUSION">Infuse</LSTag> will have all <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> made toward them be made with <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag>.
Enemies you <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="INFUSION">Infuse</LSTag> will fall <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SLEEPING">Asleep</LSTag> at the start of their next turn.
Enemies you <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="INFUSION">Infuse</LSTag> cannot recover <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">Hit Points</LSTag>.
Enemies you <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="INFUSION">Infuse</LSTag> have their weapon's damage dice decreased to a D4.
Enemies you <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="INFUSION">Infuse</LSTag> cannot move.
Enemies you <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="INFUSION">Infuse</LSTag> become <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="REDUCE">Reduced</LSTag>.
Impose upon enemies -2 penalty to all <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> upon <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="INFUSION">Infusing</LSTag> them.
Enemies you <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="INFUSION">Infuse</LSTag> cannot use their <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="ReactionActionPoint">Reaction</LSTag>.
Enemies you <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="INFUSION">Infuse</LSTag> make all <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag> with <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag>.
Enemies you <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="INFUSION">Infuse</LSTag> have all <LSTag Tooltip="TemporaryHitPoints">Temporary Hit Points</LSTag> stripped from them.
Enemies you <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="INFUSION">Infuse</LSTag> become <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SILENCED">Muted</LSTag>.
Impose upon enemies a -2 penalty to their <LSTag Tooltip="DifficultyClass">Difficulty Class</LSTag> upon <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="INFUSION">Infusing</LSTag> them.
Enemies you <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="INFUSION">Infuse</LSTag> make their <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> with <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag>.

Enemies you <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="INFUSION">Infuse</LSTag> deal half damage with all weapon based <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> which utilize their <LSTag Tooltip="Strength">Strength</LSTag>.

Creation manifests brilliance, moulded in arcane echoes.
Productions of power, brought to life by your ingenuity.
At the beginning of each turn while in combat, you gain <LSTag Tooltip="TemporaryHitPoints">Temporary Hit Points</LSTag> equal to your <LSTag Tooltip="ProficiencyBonus">Proficiency Bonus</LSTag>.
Your firearms are incapable of <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="FIREARM_MALFUNCTION">Misfiring</LSTag>.

When an enemy casts a Spell, you may expend one round of <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="FirearmAmmo">Ammunition</LSTag> in order to make a <LSTag Tooltip="RangedWeaponAttack">Ranged Weapon Attack</LSTag> against them with your firearm.
When an enemy casts a Spell, make a <LSTag Tooltip="RangedWeaponAttack">Ranged Weapon Attack</LSTag> against them with your firearm.
Gain the ability to deploy a turret within [1] of you.

Deploy an arcane turret within [1] of you.

This Cantrip may be cast while Silenced or Muted and will not break Stealth.

Fire an arcane missile which will seek out a creature of your choosing.

This Cantrip may be cast while Silenced or Muted and will not break Stealth.
The number needed to roll a <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hit</LSTag> with your firearms is reduced by one.
Gain the ability to cause a localized elemental shock with your equipped ranged weapon, causing it to deal an additional 1d4 damage type of your choice.

Cause a localized elemental shock with your equipped ranged weapon, allowing it to deal additional damage.

This Cantrip may be cast while Silenced or Muted and will not break Stealth.

Infuse your equipped ranged weapon with additional elemental damage.

This Cantrip may be cast while Silenced or Muted and will not break Stealth.
Affected creature deals an additional [1] when dealing damage with their equipped weapon.
Once per turn, missing an <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag> will refund your <LSTag Tooltip="Action">Action</LSTag>.

Once per combat, upon starting your turn in combat below 25% of your total <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">Hit Points</LSTag>, you consume a synthetic potion. This synthetic potion restores [1] <LSTag Tooltip="HitPoints">Hit Points</LSTag> upon ending your turn.
Dealing damage with your firearms causes your target to Burn.

When an ally is damaged, you may expend one round of <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="FirearmAmmo">Ammunition</LSTag> in order to make a <LSTag Tooltip="RangedWeaponAttack">Ranged Weapon Attack</LSTag> with one of your firearms against their aggressor.
When an ally is damaged, make a <LSTag Tooltip="RangedWeaponAttack">Ranged Weapon Attack</LSTag> with one of your firearms against their aggressor.
Gain a +4 bonus to your Initiative.

Grant an ally a +2 bonus to their <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">Armour Class</LSTag>, <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag>, Damage Rolls, or their <LSTag Tooltip="DifficultyClass">Difficulty Class</LSTag>. Each effect may only be applied to one ally at a time.

Grant an ally a +2 bonus to their Armour Class. This effect may only be applied to one ally at a time.

This Cantrip may be cast while Silenced or Muted and will not break Stealth.

Grant an ally a +2 bonus to their Attack Rolls. This effect may only be applied to one ally at a time.

This Cantrip may be cast while Silenced or Muted and will not break Stealth.

Grant an ally a +2 bonus to their weapon's Damage Rolls. This effect may only be applied to one ally at a time.

This Cantrip may be cast while Silenced or Muted and will not break Stealth.

Grant an ally a +2 bonus to their Difficulty Class. This effect may only be applied to one ally at a time.

This Cantrip may be cast while Silenced or Muted and will not break Stealth.
Affected creature has received a +2 bonus to their <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">Armour Class</LSTag>.
Affected creature has received a +2 bonus to their <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag>.
Affected creature has received a +2 bonus to their weapon's Damage Rolls.
Affected creature has received a +2 bonus to their <LSTag Tooltip="DifficultyClass">Difficulty Class</LSTag>.
Dealing damage with your firearms causes your target to be thrown backward by [1]. This effect can be toggled at any time.
When dealing damage, the minimum value you can roll is 4.

Once per turn, upon landing a Killing Blow or a <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hit</LSTag> with a <LSTag Tooltip="RangedWeaponAttack">Ranged Weapon Attack</LSTag>, you restore one round of <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="FirearmAmmo">Ammunition</LSTag>.

Once per turn, landing a <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hit</LSTag> with one of your firearms allows you to expend one round of your <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="FirearmAmmo">Ammunition</LSTag> in order to fire at your target again.
Affected creature may be fired upon once again by their aggressor.
Ending your turn grants you <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BLADE_WARD">Blade Ward</LSTag> until the start of your next turn.
After landing a Killing Blow, you may <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_Reload_Firearm">Reload</LSTag> your firearms as a free action.
Affected creature may <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_Reload_Firearm">Reload</LSTag> their firearms as a free action.

You may expend your <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="BonusActionPoint">Bonus Action</LSTag> in order to regain your <LSTag Tooltip="Action">Action</LSTag>. Afterwards, you will be unable to use your Bonus Action again until you <LSTag Tooltip="ShortRest">Short Rest</LSTag>.

Expend your <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="BonusActionPoint">Bonus Action</LSTag> in order to regain your <LSTag Tooltip="Action">Action</LSTag>. Afterwards, you will be unable to use your Bonus Action again until you <LSTag Tooltip="ShortRest">Short Rest</LSTag>.
Affected creature is unable to utilize their <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="BonusActionPoint">Bonus Action</LSTag>.

Landing a <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hit</LSTag> with a <LSTag Tooltip="RangedWeaponAttack">Ranged Weapon Attack</LSTag> permanently inflicts <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="GAPING_WOUND">Gaping Wounds</LSTag> on your targets.
Used to fire your currently equipped firearms unique actions.
This blunderbuss appears to have been fashioned from gondian metalworking, held together by their craftsmanship. When fired, the firearm emits a loud, irregular bang.
A sleek, elegant firearm that marks a significant leap forward in personal weaponry. When fired, it triggers a distinctive ignition system which relies on a flint striking steel to produce sparks.
This heavy, ornate firearm features a long barrel carved with intricate patterns and a finely crafted flintlock ignition system. When fired, it unleashes a devastating bolt of lead.
Fire a shell which can decimate a nearby enemy.

Fire a scattershot round from your blunderbuss, dealing damage in an area and leaving your targets no chance to evade it.

This action cannot miss. As such, it also cannot roll a Critical Hit.
Fire a single shot with your flintlock.
Fire three shots from your flintlock simultaneously.
Fire a long range shot from your musket.

Enter into a crouched stance, doubling your muskets range and the bonus damage provided by Boots on the Ground. While in this crouched stance, Attack Rolls are made with Advantage and your Movement Speed is reduced to zero.

Using this action again will cause you to stand back up, restoring your ability to move.

Affected creature has entered into a crouched stance, doubling their muskets range and the bonus damage provided by <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="BootsontheGround">Boots on the Ground</LSTag>. While in this crouched stance, their <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> are made with <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> and their <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">Movement Speed</LSTag> is reduced to zero.

Summon one of three unique firearms. As you level in Artificer, they will deal additional damage and gain new effects.

Summoning your firearms may be done at any time as a free action.
Summon a blunderbuss, capable of dealing high damage to multiple targets at a short range.
Summon a flintlock capable of dealing consistent damage at a medium range.
Summon a musket capable of dealing high single target damage at a long range.
Restore your supply of ammunition and clear any <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="FIREARM_MALFUNCTION">Misfires</LSTag>.

Affected creature's firearm has malfunctioned. It cannot fire until the start of their next turn.
Cleared by Reloading.
